reactTrigger.expression:
const type = GetRecordTypeId(GetHitSourceRecord(GetHitEvent()));
GetStatModValue(GetHitEvent(), $#10516612381411111:108986352686712$) < 0.0 &&
type != GetReactionTypeId() &&
type != GetEffectTypeId() &&
HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "Element.Magical.Ice") || HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "Element.Magical.Water")
